permafrost.tundra.server

Class NodeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.NodeHelper

  • public class NodeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with webMethods Integration Server namespace nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private NodeHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

      • listRoot

        public static java.util.SortedSet<java.lang.String> listRoot(java.lang.String pattern,
                                                             java.lang.String type,
                                                             boolean recurse)
        Returns a list of all the child leaf nodes defined under the root interface on this server.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The regular expression pattern used to filter the returned nodes by name; if null all nodes are returned.
        type - The type of node to be returned; if null all node types are returned.
        recurse - Whether to recursively list child interfaces.
        Returns:
        A sorted set of child nodes.
